DOC.brief_summary: This trial consist 2 part : double-blinded phase open-label extension phase . The open-label extension phase describe record . All participant receive dose GWP42003-P . However , investigator may subsequently decrease increase participant 's dose optimal dose find .
DOC.brief_title: An Open-label Extension Trial Cannabidiol ( GWP42003-P , CBD ) Seizures Tuberous Sclerosis Complex ( GWPCARE6 )
